## Enter Own Data

I entered the following data into Excel and saved it as a CSV file.

![dho_data](http://derekogle.com/NCMTH107/modules/CE/1_CE_KEYS/dho_data.JPG)

In R, I started a script with `library(NCStats)`, saved it to the same folder as my CSV file, used the Session..Set Working Direction.. To Source File Location menu items to set the working directory, copied the `setwd()` to my script, and then used `read.csv()` to load the file. My script, including the code to show the entire data frame and the structure of the data frame is below.

```{r}
library(NCStats)
setwd("C:/aaaWork/Web/GitHub/NCMTH107/modules/CE/1_CE_KEYS")
dho_df <- read.csv("dho_data.csv")
dho_df      # entire data.frame
str(dho_df)
```

&nbsp;

## Load Data From Webpage

I downloaded **fire.csv** to my working directory. In R, I started a new script with `library(NCStats)`, saved it to the same folder as my CSV file, copied the `setwd()` from my first script, and then used `read.csv()` to load the file. My script, including the code to show the entire data frame and the structure of the data frame is below.

```{r echo=FALSE}
firedf <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/droglenc/NCData/master/Fire.csv")
```
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(NCStats)
setwd("C:/aaaWork/Web/GitHub/NCMTH107/modules/CE/1_CE_KEYS")
firedf <- read.csv("fire.csv")
```
```{r}
str(firedf)
headtail(firedf)
```
